cz.agents.alite.communication.protocol.cnp
Class CnpInitiator

java.lang.Object
  cz.agents.alite.communication.protocol.cnp.Cnp
      cz.agents.alite.communication.protocol.cnp.CnpInitiator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Protocol
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectoredCnpInitiator
public abstract class CnpInitiator
extends Cnp

Initiator part of the basic Contract-net-protocol. When created, it registeres protocol handler to the given communicator. In the end of the protocol the handler is automatically derregistered.

Author:
vokrinek
